title: Income Tax (African Management Services Company) (Approval and Exemption) Order, 2017
content:
29thSeptember,2017 Statutory Instruments 811
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.70 OF 2017
The Income Tax Act
(Laws,Volume19,Cap.323)
The Income Tax (African Management Services
Company) (Approval and Exemption) Order, 2017
INEXERCISE ofthepowerscontainedinsection 15oftheIncome
TaxAct,thefollowingOrderismade:
1. This Order may be cited as the Income Tax (African Title
ManagementServicesCompany)(ApprovalandExemption)Order,
2017
2. TheAfricanManagementServicesCompany(AMSCO)is Approval of
anapprovedorganisationforpurposesofexemptionfromtaxwith international
organisation
respecttotheagreementspecifiedintheSchedule.
3. The income earned by the organisation approved in Exemption
paragraph 2 and accruing under the Agreement specified in the fromtax
Schedule is exempt from tax pursuant to paragraph 5(5) of Part
IIIof the SecondSchedule totheAct.
SCHEDULE
(Paragraph2)
AGREEMENT
The Cooperation Framework Agreement for Enterprise Development in
ZambiabetweentheGovernmentoftheRepublicofZambiathroughMinistry
ofFinanceandtheAfricanManagementServicesCompany,signedatLusakaon
17thFebruary,2017.
F. MUTATI,
LUSAKA Minister of Finance
28thSeptember,2017
[MFB.64/9/4C]
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101Lusaka.PriceK4.00each.
812 Statutory Instruments 29thSeptember,2017
